cause.description:
For all those families and kids out their in the middle east/Iraq/Lebanon/Palestine/Afghanistan who go hungry everynight and those who dont have a home, we're gonna try to raise as much money as we can to help them out and stop the violence thats happening.
1. War must end
2. Kids should be in school not fighting
3. Peace in the middle east
cause.mission: Raise us much as we can for the people in the middle east
cause.name: Stop The Wars In The Middle East
